reviewTextParts.Liked: The location is superb! Right on the middle of Old Town Square. Around the corner is the church and the Astronomical Tower. Short distance is the Chrales bridge.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: It's an old building so no elevator to the third floor where we stayed. No AC either which is normal on the area.
No amenities, not even body wash

reviewTitle: Excellent location, nice big apartment, management not so friendly

reviewTextParts.Disliked: we were not made aware that we had to collect keys at one location and then Uber again to the apartment

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The slant in the ceiling, window wouldn’t open, loose mirror, load radiators and the window into patio where the people in the other apartment could look into

reviewTextParts.Liked:
The Bathroom is new. Very good. The Appartment was small but cosy.
The Appartment was situated just above the Carl,s bridge. The Internet connection was perfect, even outside.
Clear and easy explanation how to get to the Appartment. No key , only the combination. Perfect.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The light in the room was very dim.
The reception and the Appartment itself was situated 20 min. away.
There was only one big pot in the kitchen. There will be nice to have one more small.

reviewTitle: Fine for a one night stay

reviewTextParts.Liked: Great location, good apartment.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Convoluted booking process and key collection.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Nice quiet location in the 6h floor, 100m away from the reception. New furniture, very nice
Location.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Very poor directions given from main office staff in terms of how to find the actual apartment.

reviewTitle: very nice apartment in an excellent location

reviewTextParts.Liked: Excellent oldtown local, very central but still quiet.Rooms are massive
closer to everything
reviewTextParts.Disliked: only have 1 bathroom☹️

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Loved the location and the spaciousness of the apartment. Great for our family of 4 and can fit another 3 people!
Walk everywhere to all the main attractions it’s very safe.
Walk to the Old Town square, castle river and stunning scenery.
P.s don’t book tours especially the City Sightseeing Hop on Hop off bus tour as they are a terrible waste of money…just walk.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The photos are not exactly what you get - same space but just different decor, but still great.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Clean apartment in a good location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: No need for a couch in the room, very little space for bags. Can get a bit noisy with construction but that's to be expected given the central location

reviewTextParts.Liked: location was excellent and apartment had a nice balcony
reviewTextParts.Disliked: construction work was happening during our stay which was loud at 7am but otherwise would highly recommend

reviewTitle: In the heart of old Praha

reviewTextParts.Liked: Spacious apartment, great location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The locks of the doors were difficult to open.

reviewTitle: Glad it wasn’t a weekend as quite noisy

reviewTextParts.Liked: Airy and clean
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Great location
Could do with fixing hot water and doors closing between bedrooms

reviewTextParts.Liked: The apartment position was great, and the receptionists were really friendly and helpful.All the rooms were clean and comfortable.The apartment had all the necessary things to cook and wasn't far from a supermarket.
Everything was nice and clean ! Great location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There was a coffee machine but no coffee cups. That was little annoying 😊

reviewTitle: Overall, our stay was very good.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Overall it was a good service
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Some of the boys were complaining on being short on towels and bed sheets. (we had booked 2 apartments, 3 bedroom and 4 bedroom for 8 ppl (total 7 bedrooms whereas 6 was supposed to be on their own and 2 sharing one bedroom), but instead they had most of the beds ready and prepped in one room(3 beds), and this caused a little disagreement.  We thought reasoning of booking  2 apartments for 8 ppl so most could have their own bedroom, otherwise we could've booked only one apartment).

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location is great five minute walk to town square with several cafes, restaurants,  and coffee shop on the same street. The apartment was large and spacious with lots of beds.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Furnishings were not comfotable and appearance was bland.

reviewTitle: Wonderful value for money, clean and beautiful, and the perfect location

reviewTextParts.Liked: A beautiful apartment perfectly situated in a vibes street during the day but peaceful at night. Close to everything. It was comfortable, beautiful and clean.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: That I had to leave

reviewTextParts.Liked: Good location. It was kind of between new town and old town so we didn't use train or metro to get anywhere(everything was walking distance). The kitchen had everything you can need. Very big and comfortable shower.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There wasnt enough light- in the evenings it was very dark in the apartment. Another thing, (even though it wasnt that bad)if you don't like a lot of noise then it might not be for you- the apartment was right next to the train station so many people were walking through our street with the luggages.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Nice apartment n location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Very rude staff at the reception,specially Jonathan

reviewTitle: Amazing location. Little things missing to get 10 out of 10

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location was just AMAZING
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Not even a tea bag in the kitchen

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location is perfect, apartment was very big and beds were very comfortable.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Sofa was very dirty and had stains, bathroom could have been cleaner.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location was great, everything walking distance. Easy to get keys from reception. The tv was good, you could log into your Netflix. Very secure building, felt safe. Had a lift as well. Comfortable beds! They provide towels for you which is great.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The photos didn’t match the apartment we got - we got the smallest and cheapest option which is fine just wasn’t expecting the double bed to be in the kitchen and the second double bed to be in the lounge as it said 2 bedroom. Was fine though, we made do! We were on the fourth floor I think, and the building is next to a bar so you do hear lots of music and people partying outside when your windows are open but I just wore ear plugs for that. The place doesn’t have anything  - like I couldn’t see any coffee pods for the coffee machine? There was some salt but no pepper - just expect to buy your own things for kitchen if you need any seasoning etc. we didn’t cook anyway so was okay!

reviewTextParts.Liked: Apartment was clean and in a great location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There was no air conditioning

reviewTextParts.Liked: The apartment was 5 minutes to the city center. It has everything you need.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The apartment could be cleaned a little better, there was some dust on the stairs and not much room to move in the second bedroom. Apart from that, it's a really good deal!

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location is good.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: It would be nice to let us know what floor level and no elevator. It should have more than one fan and at least more than two towels.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location, location, location. Right behind the church and grand platz of Praha, this little outdated but authentic and spacious apartment with high ceilings and a separate room for every guest was a good pick for short stay.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Paid parking and no conditioner

reviewTextParts.Liked: good location spacious appartment
reviewTextParts.Disliked: few more kitchen equipment in appartment

reviewTitle: Kaprova 14 is a very nice apartment in a superb location, because of the location it could be noise due to cars and peop

reviewTextParts.Liked:
We stayed at Kaprova 14 apartment.
It is a very clean and very modern apartment with all the facilities. The location was super and we could walk everywhere.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Because of the superb location, it was very noisy. We couldn’t sleep until 1am because of traffic and people making noises on the Rd. Always awaken by 5:30am because of bin or delivery lorries noises.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location, the balcony
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The service, the staff, the organization

reviewTitle: Worth the money, depending on which flat you get, the location is superb.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location is perfect. The flat was nice and clean, and both check in and out super simple.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: We did not have hot water for some reason..

reviewTextParts.Liked: location is very central and very close to tourist spots.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Check in and check is very problematic, even i have completed the pre registration i still had to go to a different reception which is 8 to 10 mins walk, when they can just give a code since there is lock box, check out is the same needs to surrender the key to the reception, very inconvenient, 2nd the 200 euro deposit 1 day before check in is also required to do, when you can do it upon check in. I think they should make an effort in making check in and check out smooth.

reviewTextParts.Liked: How central it was and how many beds it had
reviewTextParts.Disliked: How hot it was inside, how noisy it was from the pub downstairs

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location, facility and the staff :)
Great location! Everything in the apartment that we could need  even a washing machine..
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Was a different way of finding our accommodation. First going to Old Town Square Apartments  & once there, you were directed to your  accommodation address.. They gave us a map, keys & info about the apartment.
Everything was perfect we take one room for three and was really comfortable

reviewTitle: Excellent location; studio requires some improvement.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Very helpful assistants at the agency both on arrival & departure.  Location couldn’t  be better for what we needed.  Good shops across the street.  Good size fridge/freezer.  Will definitely book again.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Zatecka 10, Z3.  Some minor improvements required: 1) No chopping board - difficult to cut bread etc.  2) Not enough sockets, bedside table lamps have short cables that don’t reach as far as the socket and cannot be plugged in without an  extension lead); we discovered Only One extension lead tucked in a drawer that we had to move around to plug in chargers, lamps, iron.  Two extension leads would allow lamps and mobile/laptop chargers 3) Chopping & bread knives, only the serrated ones are sharp enough, the other two are useless.  4) unsafe to open skylights - one needs to climb on the chair and even then only my tall husband could open/close it.  There are notices re risk of flooding when it rains - no wonder since there’s no pole to help open it with the feet on the ground.  The studio  needs a woman’s touch in terms of pragmatism.  Seems to be furnished for guests who spend hardly any time inside with closed windows at all times.  lots of flights to climb up and down to and from the lift and the studio - it’s a loft conversion and access is quite convoluted - it didn't bother us, but people should  be made aware in case they carry suitcases or a baby pram etc.  Despite this, we enjoyed our stay.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Amazing location. Very spacious apartment. Master bedroom is great.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Keep in mind location is for the key pickup, not the apartment itself. It is close by however in a great and central location. There weren’t many kitchen utensils which made cooking challenging. The second bed is in the lounge, and there’s only one shared bathroom which requires the person staying in the bedroom to walk past you sleeping in the lounge when using the toilet at night

reviewTextParts.Liked: Great location in an old monastery next to Charles Bridge (they got different locations, though)
Amazing location, clean property, great value for money!
Excellent location. Basic but had everything
reviewTextParts.Disliked: €200 deposit required on check in.

reviewTitle: Good location. Next to the church in the city Center and lots of eating places and pubs around.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: It’s above the pub. The whole night there is too much noise till 4 am.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location is super,near the Karlov bridge.App is very comfortable.I recommend.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Everything

reviewTextParts.Liked: One apartment was in the center of the old square which is convenient and big enough.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: We booked two apartments together for our whole group and the two apartments were far apart making it difficult for us as a group. Would have appreciated the reservation team considering the fact that we were booking as 1 group and assigning apartments either in the same building or at least very close to each other.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The service, the apartman and the location was Expectional! Any time again if I visit the City again.
Perfect location, patient staff with good problem solving skills.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: They changed our booking without any prior discussion with us or informing us. Don’t pay the deposit in advance, because you will have problems  with getting it back.

reviewTitle: The property was very dirty, damaged and nothing like the pictures they sell you on booking.com. No towels, toilet paper

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location was good.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The property was very dirty, damaged and nothing like the pictures they sell you on booking.com. No towels, toilet paper, toiletries, basic kitchen requirement such as kitchen towel, trash bag, etc…….

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location and apartment cleanliness
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There are no liquid soaps in the shower area only hand wash.

reviewTitle: To say something positive “it did”. The apartment was a disappointment after seing all the beautiful pictures. I wouldn’

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Nothing other than location.
The property looked nothing like any of the pictures you see on booking.com! One bed was in the kitchen and the other in the living room.
The kitchen bedroom had one curtain to supposedly cover a large window, and sat in the middle of the window with large gaps all the way around. This caused light to enter the room at all hours.
The mattress was like sleeping on concrete.
The apartment was up 6 flights of stairs with only one set of keys and a flashing hall light out the front.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The property looked nothing like any of the pictures you see on booking.com! One bed was in the kitchen and the other in the living room.
The kitchen bedroom had one curtain to supposedly cover a large window, and sat in the middle of the window with large gaps all the way around. This caused light to enter the room at all hours.
The mattress was like sleeping on concrete.
No privacy was allowed as both “bedroom” aKa the kitchen and the lounge, doors were glass so light shown through and you could see into the rooms.
The apartment was up 6 flights of stairs with only one set of keys.
There was a flashing hall light out the front of the apartment that actually made us all feel sick when walking up the stairs.
I had requested a bottle of Prosecco upon arrival which I paid for as a surprise and it wasn’t there.

reviewTitle: Right in the heart of a wonderful city

reviewTextParts.Liked: It is right in the center of the super busy old town, but still not noise. So you have everything around the corner while you van rest during the night. A plus: wonderful chimney cake smell is comming in the apartment. Prague is wonderful and it right in the middle.

reviewTitle: Great value for money and would recommend to ANYONE coming to prague

reviewTextParts.Liked: it was amazing, great location, great price, friendly staff!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: the reception was far from the apartment, but not too bad

reviewTitle: happen to return and stay here again

reviewTextParts.Liked: Apartment was very cosy, warm and perfect for our stay
The apartment is spectacular. Clean, tidy, very nicely designed. The location is spectacular. The area around has everything you might need - mini market, off licence, cafe.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The fact that there was no cleaning service on a daily basis.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Place, view, easy check in/out
Clean, comfortable
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Location not the same as indicated while booking on the map
15min walking farer from the center in reality
You see just reception location during booking, they deliver key here, than send you out to the appartement far from here...

reviewTextParts.Liked: Staff were very friendly and helpful, room was perfect.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: All great except window in bathroom was clear for people to see into.
There was an apartment above us on the 6th floor, and they were so loud every night from midnight till the morning, so we basicly didn’t sleep for 3 days…. only like one hour/night. it was terrible.

reviewTextParts.Liked: very confortable, all is clean. we like a lot the apartment.
very spacious, nice comfy beds, towels, blanket.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: veeeery slow wifi, the tv was only in czech couldn't watch anything else, the elevator stops in each floor.

reviewTextParts.Liked: loads of space ,clean ,lovely appartment ,
reviewTextParts.Disliked: issues with toilet role and towels I had to go out and buy toilet roll

reviewTextParts.Liked: Spacious apartment, had amazing facilities and good location. Beds where comfortable.
The location was good, it was close to everything.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
There was some club downstairs and it was so loud all night. We could hardly sleep.
Also the elevator didn’t work so we had to climb 4 flights of stairs.
The apartment didn’t look as clean and nice in the pictures listed.

reviewTitle: Not exactly what it says on the tin

reviewTextParts.Liked: The apartment was clean and secure and not as noisy as some in the reviews for Old Square Apartments. There was acknowledgement that the original booking and payment for a two bedroom apartment had not been honoured and I am expecting a refund.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: If the Competition and Marketing authority were looking at these apartments closely, I think they might ask one or two questions about the difference between what is marketed and what is offered. The appartment looked nothing like the ones advertised on the website, was 1.2 km away from so-called reception, not 300m as advertised, was nowhere near the old square, and only had one bedroom not two.

reviewTitle: Have been in third floor, 65 stairs 😄

reviewTextParts.Liked: location of appartmet is in the city centre. Unfortunately, we did not know the exact location of the apartment until arriving at the reception
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Appartmet has only two small windows, not like any on booking picures. Double bad has broken middle leg. The other bed creaked with every slightest movement.

reviewTitle: very happy and very soon i will come over again

reviewTextParts.Liked: very clean and great location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: none

reviewTitle: Oh, think twice, 'cause it's another day for you and me in overprice

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location. The manners of personnel at reception.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Even though we got an apartment on Main Square, we were not sure where it was located until the last moment. The condo was definitely conceived as a stag-night cave and it was far from what's presented on pictures. Apart from fresh towels and clean sheets, do not expect anything else. The kitchen is rather underequipped, the floor was cleaned probably last time in the Czechoslovakian era and the heating is not working. Be aware that if you are an only-man group, you shall prepare for a deposit of 200-600eur. The price depends on how fast you are able to respond to the message.

reviewTitle: Prague is a breathtaking city that would require multiple visits to really appreciate its culture and history

reviewTextParts.Liked: Had everything you needed, massive apartment for great value for money. travelling with a group makes this place perfect. Location was excellent and would definitely visit again.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: If you have a bad back or leg our apartment was up 80+ steps that might cause some people a problem but I’m sure if you tell reception before arrival they’d accommodate you

Extremely filthy mattress, which we discovered the next morning. Never seen anything like it.
You do not want to know what was on it, not to mention the smell.
And there was only a thin bedsheet...
The simple memory of it makes you tremble.
Highly not recommended for this single reason.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Close to just about everything you'll want to see and go to in Prague. Lots of room and nice TV.
Central
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Pictures not the same as the one we stayed in !!! Total lies , we were given an old apartment that needed painting, old kitchen and beds and old furniture.
Not as promised as per photos attached on booking.com website

reviewTextParts.Liked: Everything is close. Although the apartment is old, it is clean and large.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The apartment did not match the photographs, there was no light in the toilet, the washing machine did not work, the hot water disappeared on the second day and my family and I, returning at 21:00, took a cold shower from the walk. A terrible view from the windows, including a trash bin under the kitchen windows. Parking is paid, 30euro per day and another 10 minutes walk to it. To enter the apartments, you need to go to the office, take shape, get keys, pay for parking, while it is almost impossible to park by car near the office. Further, you will be required to have a deposit of 200 Euro, which you will receive back already a month after eviction. You decide!

reviewTitle: Would use Old Town Apartments again, but make sure not to be near party groups.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Great location with amazing views of Old Town. Loved that everyone in our family had their own rooms!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Wasn't quite as clean as I had hoped for. Expected a few amenities--there were coffee machines but no filters and no coffee. No extra blankets, sheets, towels.  Lots of groups of guys partying in other airbnbs in the building. But overall it worked well for us.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location plenty space nice and clean
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing

reviewTextParts.Liked:
The apartment size was amazing.
Central location for the astronomical clock.
Easy check in
There was loads of room and a great central location
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing

reviewTextParts.Liked:
It was great! We ordered an apartment for 4 persons and got a bigger apartment- suitable for up to 7 persons (3 king beds and one sofa bed)
The location in great

reviewTitle: Will come back for the same apartment.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Great location, secure , clean and modern equipment in the beautiful apartment
reviewTextParts.Disliked: No dislike.

reviewTitle: Location is awesome but apartment specially, bathroom was too bad and of lower standards.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location is awesome
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Apartment where I stayed at Zatecka 10, was not same quality as shown on site. There were stairs to reach lift. Also Bathroom was terrible and below standards.
